intro: Fight Your Way to the Top!
description:
Challenge the streets in Street Combat Fighting, a fast-paced 3D brawler that brings classic street fighting action to a modern, low-poly world.

Punch, kick, and combo your way through a variety of opponents on different stages, ranging from warehouses and offices to underground gyms. Master your timing, unlock new abilities, and work your way up from rookie to champion in Career Mode. Or, jump straight into Arcade Mode for quick, intense battles.

Features:
• Dynamic 3D low-poly visuals with unique environments
• Two exciting modes: Career and Arcade
• Unlockable abilities and power-ups
• Easy-to-learn, skill-based combat system
• Local versus AI battles with increasing difficulty

Are you ready to become the ultimate street champion?
